ControlBlock.Description: Switch between In1 and In3 dependent on Switch signal: Switch signal rising: Switch >= Threshold up --> Out = In1 Switch signal falling: Switch < Threshold down --> Out = In3

MaskOutport.Name: Out
MaskOutport.Description: Either value of input #1 or input #3 dependent on value of input #2.

MaskParameter.Name: Thresh_up
MaskParameter.Description: Threshold level for rising switch signal.

MaskParameter.Name: Thresh_down
MaskParameter.Description: Threshold level for falling switch signal.

ImplementationParameter.Name: Thresh_up
ImplementationParameter.Description: Threshold level for rising switch signal.

ImplementationParameter.Name: Thresh_down
ImplementationParameter.Description: Threshold level for falling switch signal.

ImplementationParameter.Name: Thresh_up
ImplementationParameter.Description: Threshold level for rising switch signal.

ImplementationParameter.Name: Thresh_down
ImplementationParameter.Description: Threshold level for falling switch signal.

ImplementationParameter.Name: Thresh_up
ImplementationParameter.Description: Threshold level for rising switch signal.

ImplementationParameter.Name: Thresh_down
ImplementationParameter.Description: Threshold level for falling switch signal.

ImplementationParameter.Name: Thresh_up
ImplementationParameter.Description: Threshold level for rising switch signal.

ImplementationParameter.Name: Thresh_down
ImplementationParameter.Description: Threshold level for falling switch signal.

ImplementationParameter.Name: Thresh_up
ImplementationParameter.Description: Threshold level for rising switch signal.

ImplementationParameter.Name: Thresh_down
ImplementationParameter.Description: Threshold level for falling switch signal.

ControlBlock.Description:
Look-up Table with 256+1 values.
Note: 257th value is used for preventing index overflow during interpolation. -> for periodic signals the 257th value should be set equal to 1st value -> for non-periodic signals the 257th value should be set equal to 256th value

ControlBlock.Description: Integrator for angle signals: G(s) = Ki/s = 1/(Ti*s)

MaskInport.Name: Init
MaskInport.Description: Value which is loaded at initialization function call.

MaskInport.Name: Enable
MaskInport.Description: Enable == 0: Deactivation of block; Out is set to 0. Enable 0->1: Preload of integral part. Enable == 1: Activation of block.

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfr
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for I coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfr
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for I coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfr
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for I coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfr
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for I coefficient b0
